about_the_game:
----This is an RPG that connects two worlds----


Tetsuya and his friends receive a stone called “Link's Quartz” from a girl named Mina, who says she comes from another world.

The “Link's Quartz” increases the user's physical abilities and triggers the activation of mysterious powers.

Tetsuya and his friends, now able to use their magical powers, throw themselves into a grueling battle to protect their town from the hordes of magical beasts that have suddenly begun attacking the town.

The mysterious graphics of 2D dot-picture characters moving through a 3D space.
Use the “Shift” command to change the character's standing position to gain an advantage in the battle.
Each character has his or her own special standing position, so it may be a good idea to consider their personalities when placing them.

This game is only available in Japanese.
